dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Lali-just the sinner I've been looking for-ho.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Another one of those recording devices has arrived from Konogg. Seems the lad has more he wants to say to you. Here.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: When you have a moment, be sure to see what's on it.

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: (-???-)You there!

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: Yes, the two of you! What are you doin', talkin' and noddin' suspiciously!? What are you up to!?

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: <gasp> You're conspirin' to take over the village, aren't you!? Just like those murderous machines!

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: Huh? What am I...? What did I just...? Unnngh, my head...

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Something's not right with Glagg. And it's not quite the same sort of “not right” what follows a few too many casks of ale...

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Well, whatever it is, it's nothing you need to worry about. I'll take care of it.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Now then, was there something else you needed?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Is there anything I can help with?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: How's the rebuilding coming along?

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Hmmm, well...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: (-???-)Excuse me...

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: You... What do you want? If you're here to mock us, have done with it and leave us be.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: N-No, I'm not here to mock you. On the contrary, I want to join you.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: I'm usually not one to get involved, preferring to observe from a safe distance while making the occasional comment to remind people of my presence. But seeing how hard you've been working for the village, I couldn't help but want to make myself useful for a change.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Well, we could certainly use all the help we can get... What say you, Forename? Shall we welcome him to the crew?

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Thank you! I'm certain you won't regret it!

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: After that strangeness with Glagg, I wasn't sure what to expect from our dour friend, but it sure wasn't an offer of help.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Anyway, I'll find a moment to talk with the fellow about our plans. And when he's managed to settle in, you ought to have a word with him too.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: But to answer your earlier question─there's nothing we need you for right now. Only a matter of time before we call on you again, though, so kick your feet up while you can.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A weekly quest which continues the story is now available from the dour dwarf in Komra.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Lend your aid and help the dwarves of Komra to rebuild their home.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain a message from Konogg.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The message can be viewed in your Portable Archive, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.
